description: This file declares exported API functions for TLS Hand Shaker objects in a network security context, specifically related to Transport Layer Security (TLS). It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, initializing, and resetting TLS handshaker objects, along with associated external references.

methods.name: TlsCreateHandShaker
methods.description: Creates and initializes a TLS Hand Shaker object with given context handles.

methods.name: TlsHsoCreate
methods.description: Creates a TLS Hand Shaker object with specified context handles.

methods.name: TlsHsoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified TLS Hand Shaker object.

methods.name: TlsHsoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects necessary for the TLS Hand Shaker instance.

methods.name: TlsHsoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Hand Shaker object.

methods.name: TlsHsoReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the TLS Hand Shaker object.
